ComicInfo.Summary:
Rufferto's Act of Kindness: Rufferto steals a roast chicken to eat and endures much pain and violence to hold on to it... until he runs across a family in need.
Groo In the Wild Chapter 2: After routing King Putrio's army in a refreshing after-meal fray, Groo and Rufferto wander to the village of Marfim, known to them as the home of the delicious Ortix Antelopes. But the Ortix Antelopes are all but extinct, having been hunted down for their ivory antlers and sold as a thriving enterprise of King Putrio. On their way to confront the king over this atrocity which has left no Ortix Antelopes for Groo to eat, our heroes come across "New Town" a massive dwelling construction project backed by King Putrio. Groo destroys "New Town" forcing the king to raise a second army to slay Groo.
